text:
Within the object tag, emitted through jsp:plugin, there is no way to use the 
universal attribute "id" and the attribute "declare" for only load an object 
and reference them through a link later in page.
creator: mario.hofmann@systemagmbh.de
mario.hofmann@systemagmbh.de
text:
In HTML the attribute "declare" is an empty attribute and for XHTML the only 
possible value is "declare" (--> declare="declare").

Table JSP.1-5 of the JSP 2.0 spec defines the attributes that are valid for all
standard actions including jsp:plugin. Neither id nor declare are valid for
jsp:plugin.
creator: markt@apache.org
